hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: UpdatePackageName
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: just one: dnsmasq package list: dnsmasq,nginx,......

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: State
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description:
present、installed、latest #安装。 #latest 将更新指定的包，如果它不是最新的可用版本。 #present，installed将简单地确保安装所需的程序包。
absent、removed #移除。 #absent，removed将删除指定的包。

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
test -f ${JOB_NAME}.hosts && cat /dev/null > ${JOB_NAME}.hosts tee -a ${JOB_NAME}.hosts <<- 'EOF' [CmdHostsGroup] EOF
echo $CmdHosts|grep -o ',' >/dev/null; ret=$? if [ $ret -ge 1 ]; then exit 1 else CmdHosts=(`echo $CmdHosts|sed 's|,| |g'`) for vars in ${CmdHosts[@]} do echo $vars tee -a ${JOB_NAME}.hosts <<- EOF $vars ansible_sudo_pass='$PassWord' ansible_ssh_port=$ssh_port EOF done
fi

tee ${JOB_NAME}.yaml <<- EOF --- - hosts: CmdHostsGroup remote_user: sysadmin
vars: Keys: Values list_of_packages: "${UpdatePackageName}"
tasks: #- name: Set SSH port # set_fact: # ansible_port: "${ssh_port}"
- name: some security upgrades yum: name: "{{list_of_packages}}" state: ${State}
EOF
